data.title: L.A. Care Celebrates Diversity and Inclusion at LA Pride
data.text:
L.A. Care Health Plan, the largest health plan in Los Angeles County, is proud to announce that it is sponsoring the 2024 LA Pride festival. The festival, which is called Pride in the Park, will be at Los Angeles State Historic Park on Saturday, June 8. Guests will enjoy more than 20 acres of activities, giveaways, and of course, music on an 80-foot stage. Multi-Grammy winner Ricky Martin is the headliner.

L.A. Care stands arm-in-arm with the LGBTQ+ community in Los Angeles County, as it prioritized heath care quality, access, and inclusion. The health plan will have a booth at the festival and will give away promotional items, along with important information about affordable health plan products for the entire family.

Sponsorship of LA Pride in the Park aligns with L.A. Careâ€™s commitment to health equity, which means everyone has a fair and just opportunity to be as healthy as possible.
